node.html: A personalized portfolio site using gatsbyjs and github pages Inspired by Brittanychaing.com.

frontmatter.title: Youtube Channel: A tutorial series on C++

node.html: A tutorial series on C++ from scratch.
A machine learning project to detect wheteher a person is wearing face-mask for measures against COVID-19 using keras.
An Home-security system which detects LPG-leakage, fire-crisis and provides itnruder alerts and snippet of intruder's face on your email integrated with Google assistant to ease controls.
A personalized Face-Recognition Project using KNN classifiaction.
A 3WD xbox controlled robotic base with pid tuning and MPU stabiliztion.

frontmatter.title: BMI Test with KNN embed with frontend Python GUI

node.html: A project for healthcare as an intern at Endress Hauser. It calculates(more like predict) BMI and sends it to user via email. It also has a frontend python based GUI with live inage capturing using grid method of geometry management embedded with backend smtplib for emial services
Custom filtering and stabilzing the values from IMU sensors(MPU 6050) using Kalman filter and complementary filter.
A four-legged robot based on 12 servo motors working in unison to implement trot gait mechanism with dynamic stability and relatively faster maneuverability.
A line-maze solver built with custom IR sensors and LSa08 sensor using PID tuning for dynamic stabilization.
A project to establish connection and transfer data from master MCU and slave MCUs and vice-versa through I2C bus.
A project to implement basic communication protocol between two or more MCUs using SPI bus.
